scripts.predev: npm run dart:get && npm run docs:build
scripts.prebuild: npm run dart:get && npm run docs:build

scripts.debug:labs-dom: node scripts/debug-ui.mjs --mode dev --path "/labs.html?lab=dom" --scenario labs-dom --expect-h1 "Solidus Labs: DOM" --expect-selector "#labs-root"
